ygData.subject: Re: Hunting wisps
ygData.msgSnippet: You got me... I know of both locations... One is called Kerra Island the other is called Kerra Isle.  What I dont remember is which is which, but i feel that
ygData.messageBody:
You got me...

I know of both locations... One is called Kerra Island the other is called
Kerra Isle. What I dont remember is which is which, but i feel that the
descrpition stating that it falls between Erudin and Qeynos.. (Eurd's
Crossing) via the boat is enough..

actually i belive that Kerra Isle off of Tox Forest is named Kerra Ridge..
but nones the matter.. :)



-----Original Message-----
From: Drizzt_DoUrden@... [mailto:Drizzt_DoUrden@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 29, 1999 2:29 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Hunting wisps


From: Drizzt_DoUrden@... (Chris Cornell)

That's not the real Kerra Isle. Kerra Isle can be found by going
through the Toxx Forest outside Erudin. You have to swim due west
from the dock with the Necromancer by it. I use to believe that the
island between Qeynos and Erudin was Kerra Isle, till I was corrected
by someone else.

On Wed, 28 Apr 1999 08:37:04 -0400, you wrote:

>If you can make it... Visit Kerra Isle, you can find by taking the boat
>between Qeynos and Eurdin. Its loaded with wisp and its just a small
>island. You can get stones through-out the day. But they are easier to
see
>at night because the ones that carry stones light up the ground around
them.
>
>Lance
>
